ygData.subject: Gangon? Never heard of him!...
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon rots in prison, thinking about BrightBlade, and Hell Beast and his miserable life. He decides that if he ever escapes, he s going to go back to Hell

Gangon rots in prison, thinking about BrightBlade, and Hell Beast and his m=
iserable life. He decides that if he ever escapes, he's going to go back to=
 Hell Beast and try his best to forget about BrightBlade. It would be hard,=
 but as soon as he got back to the Pred base, he was going to go back to He=
ll Beast, and be the loyal troop he was destined to be. But right now, he w=
as rotting in prison...
